targets.query: SELECT abs("Wirkungsgrad") FROM "AC" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT last("value") FROM "data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.1' AND "type" = 'Power') AND "value" >= 0 AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("value") FROM "data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.2' AND "type" = 'Power') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("value") FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.1' AND "type" = 'Power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last("value") FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.2' AND "type" = 'Power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT mean("sdm_1") + mean("sdm_2") as "consumomax"  FROM
( 
SELECT last("value") as "sdm_1" FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.1' AND "type" = 'Power') AND "value" >= 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
), 
(
SELECT last("value") as "sdm_2" FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.2' AND "type" = 'Power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
)
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.1' AND "type" = 'Power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) tz('Europe/Rome')
SELECT mean("value") * -1 FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.2' AND "type" = 'Power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) tz('Europe/Rome')

SELECT mean("prelievo_immissione") + mean("Produzione_Solare") as "consumo"  FROM
( 
SELECT mean("value") as  "prelievo_immissione" FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.2' AND "type" = 'Power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)  tz('Europe/Rome')
), 
(
SELECT mean("value") as "Produzione_Solare" FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.1' AND "type" = 'Power')  AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous) tz('Europe/Rome')
)
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("value")) FROM "data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.1' AND "type" = 'Import') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(previous) tz('Europe/Rome')

SELECT mean("produzione") - mean("immissione") as "autoconsumo"  FROM
( 
SELECT difference(last("value")) as "prelievo" FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.2' AND "type" = 'Import') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Rome')
), 
(
SELECT difference(last("value")) as "immissione" FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.2' AND "type" = 'Export') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Rome')
),
(
SELECT difference(last("value")) as "produzione" FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.1' AND "type" = 'Import') AND "value" >= 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Rome')
)
GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Rome')
SELECT difference(last("value")) as "immissione" FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.2' AND "type" = 'Export') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Rome')

SELECT mean("prelievo") + mean("produzione") - mean("immissione") as "consumo"  FROM
( 
SELECT difference(last("value")) as "prelievo" FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.2' AND "type" = 'Import') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Rome')

),
(
SELECT difference(last("value")) as "produzione" FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.1' AND "type" = 'Import') AND "value" >= 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Rome')
)
GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Rome')

SELECT (mean("produzione") - mean("immissione")) * [[price]] as "autoconsumo"  FROM
( 
SELECT difference(last("value")) as "prelievo" FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.2' AND "type" = 'Import') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Rome')
), 
(
SELECT difference(last("value")) as "immissione" FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.2' AND "type" = 'Export') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Rome')
),
(
SELECT difference(last("value")) as "produzione" FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.1' AND "type" = 'Import') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Rome')
)
GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Rome')
SELECT (difference(last("value"))) * [[price]] FROM "data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.2' AND "type" = 'Import') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(previous) tz('Europe/Rome')

SELECT "Leistung" FROM "AC" WHERE $timeFilter

( 
SELECT difference(last("value")) as "prelievo" FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.2' AND "type" = 'Import') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Rome')
), 
(
SELECT difference(last("value")) as "immissione" FROM "autogen"."data" WHERE ("device" = 'SDM2301.2' AND "type" = 'Export') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null) tz('Europe/Rome')

SELECT last("prod")+last("imm") as "autoc" FROM 
(
SELECT last("power") as "prod" FROM "http" WHERE ("url" = 'http://192.168.1.202/emeter/0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
),
(
SELECT last("power") as "imm" FROM "http" WHERE ("url" = 'http://192.168.1.202/emeter/1') AND ("power"<=0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
) 
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
